title: Chapter 1784 - The Precious Gem Workshop
body:
Chapter 1784 - The Precious Gem Workshop

The Precious Gem Workshop was located in a hidden realm within Evening Fog City.

It was the oldest of the three top black markets of the Immortal Realm, and its origins could be traced back to the Primeval Era. 

It was an extraordinary place for the simple reason that here, you could find all manner of rare and precious treasures hard to find anywhere else.

Furthermore, they accumulated vast numbers of strange treasures from the Eastern Sea year-round. They were enormously enticing to experts of the Immortal Dao.

After Su Yi arrived, he stopped by a few of the larger trading companies, sold off the divine materials he had no use for, and acquired close to three hundred thousand absolute-grade Immortal Jades.

He then took a stroll through the Precious Gem Workshop.

He’d already asked around, and he knew that the Giant Whale Spirit Race’s auction was to be held tomorrow night.

Seats had long since sold out completely, but this was no problem for Su Yi. He paid three times the original price to acquire an admission ticket from a scalper.

“What do you want for this Five Aggregates Soul-Nourishing Wood?”...
